thread.title: Waffle House shooting witness says "hero" stopped gunman

title: Waffle House shooting witness says "hero" stopped gunman
text:
Waffle House shooting witness says "hero" stopped gunman Sunday, April 22, 2018 - 01:29 
Chuck Cordero, a customer who witnessed the Waffle House shooting says, a ''hero'' inside the restaurant wrestled with the shooter until the ''gun went flying.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Chuck Cordero, a customer who witnessed the Waffle House shooting says, a "hero" inside the restaurant wrestled with the shooter until the "gun went flying." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
